text: Because our blog is reversed proxy'd, it doesn't seem that any of our posts have been added to the company sitemap. Can I generate a sitemap _just_ for our blog (<http://revops.io/blog|revops.io/blog>)? It seems my only option is to generate an xml file for the entire domain in HubSpot, but our domain.xml already exists so that wouldnt help
FYI landing pages are by default "indexed". They just aren't put into the sitemap.
